salutation.description: Accept any value from enum list.

first_name.description: First name within 2-30 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

last_name.description: Last name within 2-30 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes.

residence.description: Value receive from residence_list call, 2-letter country code.

address_line_2.description: Optional field for address line 2, within 70 characters.

address_state.description: Address state, possible value get from states_list call.

address_postcode.description: Optional field for postcode, within 20 characters and may not contain '+'.

phone.description: Phone within 6-35 digits, allowing '+' in front, numbers or space.

secret_question.description: Accept any value from enum list.

secret_answer.description: Answer to secret question, within 4-50 characters.

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.
